definition: any feature that is regarded as a sign of status (a particular power or quality or rank), to put a badge or sign on a person in order to indicate that they are allowed to be someplace
details:
noun
- any feature that is regarded as a sign of status (a particular power or quality or rank)
= example: any feature that is regarded as a sign of status (a particular power or quality or rank)
- an emblem (a small piece of plastic or cloth or metal) that signifies your status (rank or membership or affiliation etc.)
= example: an emblem (a small piece of plastic or cloth or metal) that signifies your status (rank or membership or affiliation etc.)
verb
